title: mini map help
body: hey guys, I was just wondering if anybody knew how to fix the mini-map problem where you cant click and drag on it, it was (left click + drag) to move my camera and then it went to( alt + left click + drag ) and then i clicked on every tab in the in-game options and clicked on all reset to default buttons and now i can't move it at all i've got all my old bindings back from manually resetting them again but i didn't stumble upon a binding to move the camera via mini- map, all help would be appreciated, thanks :)

replies.body: I'm pretty sure its in the interface tab of the in game settings menu
There is a option in the menu somewhere from memory, moving with mini map or something like that
